Function Documentation

const ShortAddr_t* ZDO_FindShortByExt ( const ExtAddr_t *const  extAddr)

Determines NWK address by Extended 64-bit address.

Parameters:
[in]extAddr- pointer to extended 64-bit IEEE address
Returns:
pointer to a valid NWK short address if it has been found, NULL otherwise.
const ExtAddr_t* ZDO_FindExtByShort ( const ShortAddr_t  shortAddr)

Determines Extended 64-bit address by NWK address.

Parameters:
[in]shortAddr- pointer to NWK address.
Returns:
pointer to a valid IEEE address if it has been found, NULL otherwise.
